column2: "〔Master Loga〕〔Please be calm〕〔Why rage〕〔Please answer〕〔Master Loga〕"
"〔Grrrrrrrrrrrrrr〕"
"〔...Master Loga...〕〔Why...〕"
"The Dragonkin are fighting amongst themselves?"
"It's not impossible, but listening to what's going on, I doubt that's the case."
"Wait! Professor! You don't plan on getting involved, do you?"
"Try and stop me. Hey, Dragonkin! He's been infected by Darkers. He's not himself."
"〔...ARKS〕〔I have no use〕〔Go back〕"
"Let's do as he says and just go home. This is too dangerous."
"That's enough, Light! Just shut up already!"
"So, Dragonkin, what do you plan on doing about the matter before you?"
"〔Master Loga of Hi clan〕〔Our paragon〕〔But...〕〔Commit crime against clan〕〔Law〕"
"〔All who break law〕〔Go to face Kashina without exception...〕"
"Kashina... the hell-dragon of Dragonkin lore. You mean you aim to kill, correct?"
"〔Shrewd ARKS〕〔What do you suggest?〕"
"I suggest you leave this to us. I don't like letting things die for no reason."
"Ready, <%me>?"
"Listen, if we all attack that growth using photons, then we may still be able to save him."
"I don't know if it will work, but we at least have to try."
